title: The Long Awaited!!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Nozomi-chan, Nozomi-chan, look!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Oooh~! That’s quite the pile of leaves you’ve gathered there.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>If we have this much, then we can finally make them, right!? Baked sweet potatoes, that is!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Aaah, now that you mention it, we did talk about doing that before.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>The baked apples we made last time were delicious.... But fall just isn’t right without baked potatoes~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, you’re right. Then, shall we go buy some potatoes?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Yaaay~! Let’s get some big ones!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Ah, speaking of which, Kana-chan told me that baked sweet potatoes are also great with butter.... Do you wanna try that too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Eeeh!? With butter!? I wanna try!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Alright then, let’s go buy some potatoes and butter!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
